text: I brought my son to have haircut because they have the “baby car chair”. However it’s useless to calm down the baby, and the stylist is not patient, quick cut scratched my son. Won’t recommend.

Brought my 4year old daughter here for her first hair cut. The hairstylist named Ngoi did a great job. My daughter did not cry and was enjoying her first hair cut throughout as the stylist's haircut was swift and accurate. Requested for almost 2inch trim for her long hair and fringe was cut according to request. At $14 the cut was well worth it. We left the EC house as satisfied customer. Highly recommended for parents out there who is unsure of where to bring their kids for their first haircut.
My boy hated haircut everywhere else - here was the first place he was ok and I finally it was a fun experience for both of us!
My boy is fussy over his haircut, tried first time today, friendly staff helps give a smooth and neat cut for him.

Excellent service. Skilled hairdresser who has been cutting my son's hair for 7 years. Very warm service and extremely willing to interact with their customers, giving them a better experience. Fast 10min cut. Even though it is a bit expensive ($12 per person), it is worth it.
